<h3 id="X39882">X(39882) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 5th BROCARD TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^10+(b^2+c^2)*a^8+(2*b^4+b^2*c^2+2*c^4)*a^6-(b^2+c^2)*(4*b^4+b^2*c^2+4*c^4)*a^4-(b^2-c^2)^2*b^2*c^2*a^2-(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*(b^4+b^2*c^2+c^4)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39882) = 4*X(3098)-3*X(7811) = 3*X(7812)-2*X(31670)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39882) lies on these lines: {6,9993}, {32,6776}, {69,74}, {147,13355}, {182,7846}, {206,15920}, {511,7877}, {1352,3096}, {1503,3094}, {2896,5921}, {3099,39878}, {3564,9821}, {3818,7790}, {5092,7835}, {5847,12497}, {5848,12499}, {7812,31670}, {7865,11180}, {8369,26316}, {9301,39899}, {9857,39885}, {9994,39887}, {9995,39888}, {9996,11287}, {9997,39898}, {10038,39900}, {10047,39901}, {10828,39879}, {10871,39889}, {10872,39890}, {10873,39891}, {10874,39892}, {10875,39895}, {10876,39896}, {10877,39897}, {10878,39902}, {10879,39903}, {11368,39870}, {11386,39871}, {11494,39877}, {11861,39880}, {11862,39881}, {11885,39886}, {13892,19145}, {13946,19146}, {18500,39884}, {18957,39873}, {19011,39875}, {19012,39876}, {22744,39883}, {35782,39893}, {35783,39894}</p>
<p>
X(39882) = reflection of X(9873) in X(3094)<br>
</p>
